question: National Bamboo Mission is implemented by which Union Ministry?
option2: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
option3: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option4: Ministry of Development of North Eastern region
answer: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
explanation:
The National Bamboo Mission (NBM) was originally launched as a Centrally Sponsored Scheme in 2006-07, under the Agriculture Ministry. It was then restructured with the Cabinet approval in 2018.
